portfolio.title: Coffee Shop Node.Js
portfolio.description: Coffee Shop is a web application, built using React.Js as the front-end, and Express.Js as the back-end, and PostgreSQL as the database

portfolio.title: CinemaTix - Ticket Booking GoLang
portfolio.description: Cinematix, an online ticket booking application, is designed using React.Js as the front-end, GoLang as the back-end, and PostgreSQL as the back-end.

portfolio.title: Vallete - Digital Wallet Node.JS
portfolio.description: Vallet Digital Payments, application built to make it easier to make transactions without physical money, is designed using React.Js as the front-end, Express.Js as the back-end.
